articles.description: We need to plan for many different Covid-19 vaccine scenarios. These four factors will influence the outcome.
articles.content: Without a vaccine or treatment, the world has been forced to adopt severe tactics to slow the spread of Covid-19: social distancing, shutdowns, closures, and cancellations. As states in the US begin … [+24781 chars]
